Title: Establishes a temporary task force to examine and make recommendations upon the establishment of a public title insurance carrier; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes a temporary task force to examine and make recommendations upon the establishment of a public title insurance carrier; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a temporary task force to examine and make recommendations upon the establishment of a public title insurance carrier; and to provide for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
